abstract: Ben Rubin, founder of the live-streaming video app Meerkat, was undeterred by a cold shoulder from Twitter at South by Southwest, the annual tech, music and culture festival.

headline.main: Meerkat Basks in Breakout Glow, Despite a Twitter Snag
headline.print_headline: Video App Is Basking In the Glow Of a Festival

snippet: Ben Rubin, founder of the live-streaming video app Meerkat, was undeterred by a cold shoulder from Twitter at South by Southwest, the annual tech, music and culture festival.

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
